attributes.title: 【重大告知あり!?】歌ってほしい曲No.1を当てるまで帰れない！？にじさんじカラオケ祭 #にじカラオケ祭
attributes.description:
もうすぐ夏も終わり…今夏最後の思い出にみんなで楽しく3Dカラオケ生配信で盛り上がろう！
ただし、事前にファンの皆さんから募集した「出演ライバーに歌ってほしい曲」のNo.1を当てるまで帰れない！？
さらにサプライズゲストや重大告知もあり…！？
大ボリュームでお届けするにじさんじのカラオケ企画「にじさんじカラオケ祭」お楽しみください！

【出演者】

attributes.title: 知育菓子で遊びながらおしゃべり！【#あや茶】
attributes.description:
にじさんじ所属「いずれ菖蒲か杜若」通称#あやかき のメンバー
司賀りこ、珠乃井ナナ、綺沙良、梢桃音、ルンルンの４名と１匹が休日の昼下がりに美味しいおやつを食べながらおしゃべりをする、ゆるっと配信！
今月はメンバー待望の知育菓子！美味しく作れるでしょうか？
MCは観光大使！

サムネイル：わか様
https://x.com/WK4444_/status/1826512144860656063

✧いずれ菖蒲か杜若とは✧

通称あやかき。
蘭阜という街でのんびり過ごしています。とっても素敵な街なので、みなさん遊びに来てくださいね。

【Chat Rules】
・PLEASE DO NOT BACKSEAT unless I explicitly ask for it!
・Don't spam or troll.
・Don't bring up other streamers unless I mention them first.
・Try to keep the comments relevant to the stream.
・Refrain from chatting with others viewers.
・Please get along with each others and use block if needed.
・Please no aggressive Flirting
・Try to stay on topic and not dwell on something if I've stated that we should move on.

👼 Please be mindful. No spamming or rude words. Please refrain from spamming emojis (as they can be distracting to me and other viewers) UNLESS there is an occasion where I specifically ask for it. Commenting with emojis is fine, but excessive or spammy use will result in a time out. 

👼 No discussions about drama, politics, or doxxing speculations. If I see it in the chat, you will be timed out. If I see it in a superchat or dono, I will thank you for the superchat/dono, but I will not read its contents.

I’m glad that my streams help you on your bad days, but please do not send chats, superchats, or donations containing such material, as it may make me or other viewers uncomfortable. If you do this, I will thank you for the superchat/dono, but I will not read it.

👼 Please stay on topic to the stream. If there are multiple comments being made that are not related to the stream, you will be timed out. 

👼 Try not to take things too seriously. We’re all here to just kick back and have fun! If you see anything suspicious in the chat, please remain calm. I or a mod will take care of it.

attributes.title: 【朝活雑談】体感まだ水曜日くらい【ニチアサ！緋八マン！】【にじさんじ/緋八マナ】
attributes.description:
ニチアサ緋八マンとは。
何かとだらけがちな日曜日の朝に早起きすることで時間を有効に使い
一日のQOLを爆上げしてやろうというヒーローの素敵な心意気が産んだ企画である。
実施時間は毎週日曜【07:00 ~ 08:30 (30分程前後します)】！

◆必ず読め◆
―緋八マナのコンテンツを楽しむ上でのルール―
1⃣
緋八マナの名前が出されていない場面で緋八マナの名前を書き込まない。
（少しでも「これ大丈夫かな？」と思ったらやめておくとよい。）
2️⃣
緋八マナを褒めたいがばっかりに他の人を下げるような発言はしない。
（俺と他を比較するようなコメントは控えよう。）
3⃣
Twitter（X）等のSNSでも同じ。
「緋八マナと【他のライバーさん】コラボしたらおもろそう！」
これを本人やそのファンの目に届きやすい状態で投稿するのはやめよう。（タグを付ける等）
4⃣
ゲームのネタバレ行為（例：ここはこうしたらいけるよ！）等は
俺の許可している配信もしくは俺が助けを求めた場合を除き原則禁止。

※未成年者の視聴者の方々は、下記リンク先の注意事項もご覧ください。
https://www.anycolor.co.jp/notice-for-minors

◆自己紹介◆
初めまして！世界一のオモロ人間になりたい緋八 マナです～！
俺の歌や喋りで世界中を笑顔で溢れさせます！よろしゅーお願いしますッ！🐝🐝

◆使用BGM一覧◆
OP▶Karma (zukisuzuki様制作)
ED▶Meteor(zukisuzuki様制作)

-雑談・スパチャ読み中のBGM-
zukisuzuki様 各曲▶https://zukisuzukibgm.com/
MusMus 様▶https://musmus.main.jp

◆雑談やスパチャ読みで使用させて頂いている背景◆

https://oooni-works.booth.pm/

Ryoma Barrenwort, the card swiping ronin for hire of NIJISANJI EN’s #Denauth de gozaru 💳💨
にじさんじEN所属、ディノースのカードスワイッパー浪人、 凉舞バレンウォートでござる。

【Hashtags - So I can see your awesome posts!】

▪──────  ⚔  ──────▪

【Denauth - Follow my genmates!】
・Twisty Amanozako: https://twitter.com/TwistyAmanozako / https://www.youtube.com/@TwistyAmanozako
・Klara Charmwood: https://twitter.com/KlaraCharmwood / https://www.youtube.com/@KlaraCharmwood 

▪──────  ⚔  ──────▪

【Chat Rules - So we can all have a good time!】
・Please be mindful of everyone’s chat experience, so no spam or harmful words, please!
・If you see spam or harmful messages, just report and block! Don’t engage, and don’t feed the trolls!
・Please limit emotes to 3 per line, and don't spam multiple lines in a row!
・I only know how to read English! I cannot understand messages that are not written in English, sorry! I may use a translator if necessary, but it may not always be accurate. If you are using languages other than English, please just be mindful and don’t disrupt the flow of the conversation with spam or harmful language!
・Please do not bring up other Livers in the chat unless they are relevant to the stream!
・Additionally, please do not bring me up in the chats of other Livers unless they do so first!
・Please try to stay on topic during the stream! I have a very smol brain and will get overwhelmed or confused by too many off-topic conversations, and they might also disrupt other viewers’ experiences, too! Just practice mindfulness as always, thank you!
・Please no backseating! If I am looking for help from chat, I will ask first.
・Please don’t post spoilers in chat!
・Please respect the mods and your fellow viewers. You don’t always have to agree with someone, but you can always choose to be kind! Let’s enjoy our time together and have fun!

▪──────  ⚔  ──────▪

【Chat Rules - So we can all have a good time!】
・Please be mindful of everyone’s chat experience, so no spam or harmful words, please!
・If you see spam or harmful messages, just report and block! Don’t engage, and don’t feed the trolls!
・Please limit emotes to 3 per line, and don't spam multiple lines in a row!
・I only know how to read English! I cannot understand messages that are not written in English, sorry! I may use a translator if necessary, but it may not always be accurate. If you are using languages other than English, please just be mindful and don’t disrupt the flow of the conversation with spam or harmful language!
・Please do not bring up other Livers in the chat unless they are relevant to the stream!
・Additionally, please do not bring me up in the chats of other Livers unless they do so first!
・Please try to stay on topic during the stream! I have a very smol brain and will get overwhelmed or confused by too many off-topic conversations, and they might also disrupt other viewers’ experiences, too! Just practice mindfulness as always, thank you!
・Please no backseating! If I am looking for help from chat, I will ask first.
・Please don’t post spoilers in chat!
・Please respect the mods and your fellow viewers. You don’t always have to agree with someone, but you can always choose to be kind! Let’s enjoy our time together and have fun!
